it.unimi.di.law.bubing.parser

Interface Parser

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, Filter<URIResponse>, FlyweightPrototype<Filter<URIResponse>>, com.google.common.base.Predicate<URIResponse>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BinaryParser, HTMLParser

    public interface Parser
extends Filter<URIResponse>, Cloneable
    A generic parser for responses. Every parser provides the following functionalities:
    • it acts as a Filter that is able to decide whether it can parse a certain URIResponse or not (e.g., based on the declared content-type header etc.);
    • while parsing, it will send the links found in the document to the specified Parser.LinkReceiver, that will typically accumulate them or send them to the appropriate class for processing;
    • the parsing method will return a digest computed on a (possibly) suitably modified version of the document (the way in which the document it is actually modified and the way in which the hash is computed is implementation-dependent and should be commented by the implementing classes);
    • after parsing, a guess of the charset used for the document will be made available.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Parser.LinkReceiver
      A class that can receive URLs discovered during parsing.
